Detailed Description

This package contains the set of functions provided for backward-compatibility

Gets the database errors from PVSS

WARNING! an "invalid connection" is not signalled as error, and it is not put in the exceptionInfo; It is trated separately -> indicated in the invalidConnection parameter.
